name: The Specialist Works
description: The Specialist Works is the only independent international brand performance media agency, specialising in online and offline customer acquisition. We employ 150 people, with offices in the UK, USA, Germany and Ireland, and partners in most major territories including Australia, Europe and Canada. Unlike the big networks, TSW is free of trading constraints, and unlike independents, TSW is truly international, which matters more to fast-growth e-commerce clients more than ever before.
